mapper.insert: insert into user_tb ( username, email, user_birth, phone, display_nickname, user_profile_img_url, created_dt ) values ( #{username}, #{email}, #{userBirth}, #{phone}, #{displayNickname}, #{userProfileImgUrl}, NOW() )
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from oauth2_user_tb where provider = #{provider} and provider_id = #{providerId}

select user_id as userId, username, email, user_birth as userBirth, phone, display_nickname as displayNickname, user_profile_img_url as userProfileImgUrl, last_login_dt as lastLoginDt, created_dt as createdDt, updated_dt as updatedDt from user_tb where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into pet_tb ( user_id, post_id, pet_type, pet_name, pet_birth, pet_gender, pet_breed, pet_weight, pet_profile_img_url, created_dt, updated_dt ) values ( #{userid}, #{postId}, #{petType}, #{petName}, #{petBirth}, #{petGender}, #{petBreed}, #{petWeight}, #{petProfileImgUrl}, NOW(), NOW() )
